definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
lit. like the sun at noon (idiom)/fig. to be at the peak of one's power, career etc

sentences.english: On innovative spirits as a pearl in Zhenjiang history and culture;
sentences.chinese: 易中天以其独特的历史散文创作影响一时。

sentences.english: For some stars both culminations take place above the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 有些星星两个中天都出现在地平之上。

sentences.english: The same observation holds for the Midheaven.
sentences.chinese: 中天也具有同样的情况。

sentences.english: Transit Haoyue that world, everywhere complains Le reunion.
sentences.chinese: 中天皓月明世界，遍地笙歌乐团圆。

sentences.english: The Full Moon occurs right at your midheaven.
sentences.chinese: 此时满月发生在巨蟹的中天，另一半出现。

sentences.english: The sun rose to the mid sky and doves cooed in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 太阳升到中天，鸽子在凉荫中叫唤。

sentences.english: But Professor Yi Zhongtian is going to sign books at the book store.
sentences.chinese: 易中天教授要在王府井书店签名售书。

sentences.english: Last meal is the whole family in the month of the seaside journey.
sentences.chinese: 最后一餐是全家人在月上中天的海边度过。

sentences.english: Yi Zhongtian's books are best-sellers now. I really like his books a lot.
sentences.chinese: 易中天的书现在可畅销了，我特别喜欢他的书。

sentences.english: Cock ripped the night, on the flow of transit.
sentences.chinese: 鸡鸣撕开了夜幕，月流向中天。

sentences.english: Where to Go Xiren cross carp, as if the cold shadow on transit.
sentences.chinese: 昔人跨鲤归何处，彷佛中天月影寒。

sentences.english: What kind of "stupid" question enable Mr Yi lost his yesterday's elegance?
sentences.chinese: 是什么“愚蠢”的问题让易中天失去往日的儒雅？

sentences.english: Mr. Yi Zhongtian has made the combination between the learning culture, and the public culture cent true.
sentences.chinese: 易中天先生成功实现了学术文化与大众文化的对接。

sentences.english: The Moon was at mid-sky position when it normally would have been on the horizon.
sentences.chinese: 月亮在中天的位置，而正常情况下它应该在地平线上。

sentences.english: I'll attend Professor Yi Zhongtian's lecture even if it rains hard.
sentences.chinese: 即使天下着大雨，我也要去听易中天教授的报告。

sentences.english: The sun rose to the mid sky and doves cooed in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 太阳升到中天，鸽子在凉阴中叫唤。

definition: Mercury in traditional Chinese astronomy/see also 水星[shui3 xing1]
the six directions (north, south, east, west, up, down)/the whole country/the universe/everything under the sun
